upper.title: Telegram Community DAO
upper.description: Web3 Fund with a focus on mass adoption projects

lower.title: Complete the quest and get 10K CVT Tokens
lower.description: Completing the quest will take no more than 1 minute

s2.title: Founded by community
s2.description: The creation of the DAO was spearheaded by pioneers of the TON community to support Web3 projects aimed at mass adoption. The DAO is managed through a decentralized platform by its managing partners and community members. DAO promotes the principles of openness, transparency and best practices of decentralization.

s3.title: Liqudity Provider Tokens
s3.description: LP token has a special status in our DAO. It represents a financial interest in the organization. When funds are added to the DAO treasury, new LP tokens are created. The more LP tokens you hold, the greater your share of ownership. All LP holders get access to a closed community and private chat for DAO Activities.

s4.title: Community Vote Tokens
s4.description:
CVT are used to vote on proposals in the DAO and are used to reward members for their contributions to development.

GT (Governance Token) holders manage the multisig wallet and follow the DAO constitution.

i1.title:
Private offer for TC DAO
~100% APR
Tonclout
i1.description:
Pitch Deck

Tonclout is a marketplace for buy and sell social tokens of influencers and Telegram Channels like in the stock market. We are similar to projects like Bitclout and Friend.tech, but the basic asset of our project is an advertising contract, the price of which depends on the metrics of Telegram channels and is calculated every day.

i2.title:
Private offer for TC DAO
~100% APR
Tookey
i2.description:
Pitch Deck

Tookey - no-code platform designed for setting up automated workflows, without the need for coding skills. Platform offers a user-friendly UI, similar to Zapier or IFTTT, for creating workflows across more than 120 Web2 and Web3 integrations and 24 blockchains.
